<< getfield data structures struct >>

iscellstr

Returns if a variable is a cell of strings.

Syntax

true_or_false = iscellstr(A)

Input argument

A

a variable

Output argument

true_or_false

a logical

Description

iscellstr(A) returns true if A is a cell of strings or an empty cell).

Examples

iscellstr('Nelson')


iscellstr({'Nelson'})


iscellstr({})

See also

iscell.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
